Html:
Hi, I really love this project. Thanks for sharing it.

Is there any way I can use extension methods on an object? I have an extension method on DateTime named FirstDateOfMonth. I have added DateTime to the ExpressionContext using Imports.AddType(typeof(DateTime),"DateTime") and can get at other datetime methods but can't get at the extension method. I realize that Extension Methods are really just a compiler trick but would love to get them working in Flee if possible.
